article.title: Eriocaulales
article.paragraph: UnreferencedDecember 2009File:Eriocaulon decangulare (1832).jpgthumb''Eriocaulon decangulare''Eriocaulalesis abotanical namefor anorder (biology)orderofflowering plants. The name was published by Nakai. In theCronquist systemthe name was used for an order placed in the subclassCommelinidae. The order consisted of one family only (1981):
TheAPG II systemassigns these plants to the orderPoales.
